office: House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology
key_responsibilities: oversight of the Department of Energy (DOE) and other agencies
requirements: experience in science and energy research or energy and environmental policy
strong writing, organizational, and communication skills
ability to articulate technical and policy issues
Capitol Hill or relevant government or industry experience
advanced degree or technical background (a plus)

office: Committee on Energy and Commerce Majority
key_responsibilities: coordinating with stakeholders and member offices
requirements: in-depth understanding of energy policy issues
knowledge of Federal Energy Regulatory Commission and Department of Energy

key_responsibilities: writing policy memos, letters and talking points
planning and organizing policy briefings and events
requirements: excellent research, oral and writing skills

key_responsibilities: coordinating efforts of DWC leadership and all Caucus members
developing and managing legislative priorities, memos, newsletters, press releases
pursuing engagement strategy with the new Administration
developing and maintaining relationships with external partners
organizing and facilitating DWC briefings, dinners, hearings, and events
overseeing the development and maintenance of a Caucus website and social media presence
requirements: ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines
strong organizational and time management skills
excellent written and verbal communication skills
salary: Competitive salary and benefits, commensurate with experience

key_responsibilities: managing and implementing the member's legislative priorities
promoting the office legislative and policy agenda
managing a personal legislative issue portfolio
requirements: substantial legislative, policy and staff management experience
strong communication, writing and analytical skills
ability to manage and mentor staff
experience formulating plans for advancing legislation
excellent writing, verbal and organizational skills
familiarity with health care, housing and small business federal policy

office: House Committee on Energy and Commerce Democratic Staff (majority)
key_responsibilities: supporting staff in preparations for committee events
requirements: excellent written and oral communication skills
Hill experience preferred but not required
exceptional organizational skills and attention to detail
at least one year of agriculture policy experience
